question: Which state government has collaborated with the healthcare start-up MedCords, for delivering online medical service to the people?
explanation:
The state Government of Rajasthan has collaborated with healthcare start-up MedCords for delivering online medical service to the people.
The start-up is set to provide online medical consultation and delivery of medicines to the people of Rajasthan through its applications named Aayu & Sehat Sathi. The service has covered 7 districts of the state and it will be extended to cover the whole state.
